TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DynamicRenderer extends System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn

summary.span: 當使用者移動 Tablet 畫筆時，在表面上繪製筆墨。

span.span: Draws ink on a surface as the user moves the tablet pen.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別繼承自類別，並可讓筆跡轉譯至介面，當使用者移動滑鼠指標使用 tablet 畫筆或其他指標裝置。The class inherits from the class, and allows ink to be rendered to a surface as the user moves the mouse pointer with a tablet pen or other pointing device. 您可以使用動態呈現為自訂控制項，筆墨或繼承自執行自訂轉譯筆墨啟用項目上的即時例如。You can use the to dynamically render ink on a custom control, or inherit from to perform custom rendering in real time on an ink-enabled element, such as the . 當使用者使用 tablet 畫筆輸入筆墨分開應用程式的使用者介面執行緒的執行緒上執行動態呈現。Dynamic rendering is done on a thread separate from the application's user interface thread when the user inputs ink with a tablet pen. 使用滑鼠時，UI 執行緒上執行動態呈現。When a mouse is used, dynamic rendering is done on the UI thread. > [!NOTE] > 若要參考這個類別做為[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]項目，您必須對應CLR 命名空間前置詞，並使用該前置詞來限定項目。In order to reference this class as a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] element, you must map the CLR namespace to a prefix, and use that prefix to qualify the element. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[XAML 命名空間和 WPF XAML 命名空間對應](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md)。For details, see [XAML Namespaces and Namespace Mapping for WPF XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md). ## XAML 文字用法XAML Text Usage 這個類別通常不是在 XAML 中使用。This class is not typically used in XAML. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何附加至。The following example demonstrates how to attach a to an . 若要建立的動態呈現的控制項筆墨，請參閱[建立筆跡輸入控制項](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/creating-an-ink-input-control.md)。To create a control that dynamically renders ink, see [Creating an Ink Input Control](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/creating-an-ink-input-control.md). [!code-csharp[StylusPluginSamples#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylusPluginSamples/CSharp/StylusControl.cs#3)] [!code-vb[StylusPluginSamples#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylusPluginSamples/VisualBasic/StylusControl.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## XAML 文字用法XAML Text Usage 這個屬性通常不是在 XAML 中使用。This property is not typically used in XAML. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立物件。The following example demonstrates how to create a object for a . 在此範例中，動態呈現的筆墨符合所指定的屬性`inkDA`。In this example, the dynamically rendered ink matches the properties specified by `inkDA`. 若要建立的動態呈現的控制項筆墨，請參閱[建立筆跡輸入控制項](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/creating-an-ink-input-control.md)。To create a control that dynamically renders ink, see [Creating an Ink Input Control](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/creating-an-ink-input-control.md). MemberSignature.Value: public virtual void Reset (System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice stylusDevice, System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection stylusPoints);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Reset(class System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice stylusDevice, class System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection stylusPoints) cil managed

span.span: The current stylus device.

param.name: stylusPoints
param.span: 要重新繪製的手寫筆點。

span.span: The stylus points to be redrawn.

summary.span: 清除目前筆劃的呈現並重新繪製。

span.span: Clears rendering on the current stroke and redraws it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重繪目前筆劃和任何手寫筆的點傳遞至方法。The redraws the current stroke and any of the stylus points passed into the method. 這個方法可讓您重繪筆觸，而使用者仍在建立筆劃。This method allows you to redraw a stroke while the user is still creating the stroke. 必須 tablet 畫筆碰觸數位板，或必須按下滑鼠左鍵時呼叫。The tablet pen must be touching the digitizer or the left mouse button must be pressed when is called. ## Examples 下列範例會變更為所繪製目前筆劃的色彩。The following example changes the color of the current stroke as it is being drawn. [!code-csharp[StylusPluginSamples#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylusPluginSamples/CSharp/StylusControl.cs#13)] [!code-vb[StylusPluginSamples#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylusPluginSamples/VisualBasic/StylusControl.vb#13)]

exception.span: 手寫筆和滑鼠都不是在已關閉狀態。

span.span: Neither the stylus nor the mouse is in the down state.
